headline: United Parcel Service, Inc. (NYSE:UPS): A Bearish Investment Perspective
summary: We came across a bearish thesis on United Parcel Service, Inc. (NYSE:UPS) on ValueInvestorsClub by natey1015. In this article, we will summarize the bears’ thesis on UPS. The company’s shares were trading at $134.82 when this thesis was published, vs. the closing price of $121.62 on Mar 07. UPS, a package delivery and logistics provider, […]
